project.name: Assembly descriptors for JNA native libraries
project.description: A collection for maven-assembly-plugin descriptors that can be used to create packages for native libraries so that they can be found by Java Native Aaccess (JNA). Each descriptor filters out native libraries for a specified platform and places them under the JNA's canonical prefix path (e.g., linux-amd64) within the zip archieve. To use a descriptor, add this module as dependency of maven-assembly-plugin and the corresponding descriptor into the configuration of the plugin under the tag descriptorRef.
